dct_title_s: A map of | AMERICA. |  According to ye Newest and | most Exact Observations
dct_description_sm: Includes N.th California with indented northern coast and no place names.  S. of Annian and Parts Unknown to the north.Issued in his:  Atlas geographicus: or, a compleat system of geography, ancient and modern.  Vol. 5, [p. 22a] / by Herman Moll. -- [London]: J. Nutt, 1711-1717.Reissued in: Atlas geographicus: or, a compleat system of geography, (ancient and modern) for America., Vol. V. [p22a]. -- In the Savoy: Printed by Eliz. Nutt, for John Nicholson, MDCCXVII (1717).
With Vol. III and p. 155 printed above the map. Â¶ Issued in: Modern history, or, the present state of all nations ... Vol. 3 / by Thomas Salmon. -- London: Printed for T. Longman, 1744-1746.
dct_subject_sm: California as an island--Maps--1711	I.  	II.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
